sources.src/js/views/recipeView.js:
import icons from '../../img/icons.svg'; // import icons from 'url:../img/icons.svg'; //version 2 class RecipeView { #parentElement = document.querySelector('.recipe'); #data; render(data) { this.#data = data; //Insert to recipe container const markup = this.#generateMarkup(); this.#clear(); this.#parentElement.insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', markup); } #clear() { this.#parentElement.innerHTML = ''; } renderSpinner() { const markup = `
` this.#parentElement.innerHTML = ""; this.#parentElement.insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', markup); } #generateMarkup() { return `
${this.#data.cookingTime} minutes
${this.#data.servings} servings

Recipe ingredients

    ${this.#data.ingredients.map(ing => { return `
  • ${ing.quantity}
    ${ing.unit} ${ing.description}
    • ` }).join("")}

How to cook it

This recipe was carefully designed and tested by ${this.#data.publisher}. Please check out directions at their website.

Directions
`; } } export default new RecipeView();
